introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is あやまり, which you will often hear in situations like when discussing errors in exams, acknowledging faults in a speech, or correcting mistakes. Mastering this word will help you confidently navigate conversations where errors or mistakes are the topic! Let's dive into expanding your Japanese vocabulary with あやまり!
meaning_explanation_english: The word "ayama ri" means a mistake or an error in something. It's used when someone has made an error, a blunder, or when there is something incorrect that needs to be corrected.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 間違い : まちがい : mistake
エラー : エラー : error
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word "ayama ri" are "ma chi gai" and "e ra". "Ma chi gai" generally refers to mistakes or errors, often used interchangeably with "ayama ri" but may be seen as slightly less formal. "E ra," a borrowed word, is specific to errors concerning systems or processes, such as technical errors in computing or machinery.
antonyms: 正解 : せいかい : correct answer
正確 : せいかく : accurate
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word "ayama ri" are "se i kai" and "se i kaku." "Se i kai" refers to the correct answer or solution often applied in academic or testing contexts. "Se i kaku" indicates accuracy or correctness, often contrasting with errors or mistakes found in "ayama ri."

example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は誤(あやま)りを認(みと)めた。

translations.VI: Anh ấy đã thừa nhận lỗi của mình.
translations.MY: သူသည် သူ့အမှားကို ဝန်ခံခဲ့သည်။

example_sentences.kanji: 彼はすぐに誤りを直します。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)はすぐに誤(あやま)りを直(なお)します。

translations.VI: Anh ấy nhanh chóng sửa lỗi.
translations.BN: সে দ্রুত ভুলটা ঠিক করে দেয়।
translations.MY: သူက အားလုံးကို အမြန် ပြန်ဖြေပါတယ်။
translations.HI: वह जल्दी से गलती को सुधारता है।
translations.FA: او به سرعت اشتباه را رفع می‌کند.

example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は誤(あやま)りを指摘(してき)した。

translations.VI: Anh ấy chỉ ra sai lầm.
translations.MY: သူက အမှားကို ညွှန်ပြခဲ့သည်။
translations.HI: उसने गलती की ओर इशारा किया।

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は誤りを訂正しました。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は誤(あやま)りを訂正(ていせい)しました。

translations.MY: သူသည် အမှားကို မျှမိခဲ့သည်။

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は誤りを犯しました。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は誤(あやま)りを犯(おか)しました。

translations.MY: သူကမှားယွင်းတယ်။
